alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:48PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT AREAS NEAR LUKACHUKAI IN NAVAJO NATION IN NORTHERN APACHE COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM NAVAJO NATION TIME... At 245 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Round Rock, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, heavy rainfall, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rainfall will result in muddy and potentially impassable roads. Locations impacted include... Round Rock, Red Rock, Wagon Wheel Campground, Roof Butte, Windy Pinnacle Overlook, Red Valley, Cove Chapter House, White Ash Peak, Buffalo Pass, Royal Arch, and Lukachukai. This includes Highway 191 between mile markers 477 and 478. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to minor flooding and muddy road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded or muddy roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
